about_the_game:
Spooky Witch Pack is a unique DLC for The Witch of Fern Island that will transport you into a world of dark mysteries and eerie adventures! Infuse your game with an atmosphere full of horror and magic. Feel a thrilling chill!

New Witch costume

Discover a new, dyeable spooky outfit for your witch, including a dark elegant dress, shoes and a mask.

Home decorations

Transform your home with new decorations: wallpapers with unique patterns, exclusive spooky furniture and a hanger for your broom.

Get ready for spooky fun and let the magic capture your imagination! Will you dare to enter the world of Spooky Witch Pack?
